title: Our Community Values
subtitle: Unity, fun, and kindness – so OneLiteFeather.net stays a great place for everyone.

points.title: Unity
points.text: We support each other, play as a team, and keep our respect even when things get tense. Drama belongs elsewhere, not in our chat.

points.title: Fun First
points.text: Building, farming, PvP, or events: fun comes first. Fair play over ego trips, so the experience works for everyone.

points.title: Kindness
points.text: Being kind isn’t a “nice-to-have”, it’s the default. No hate, no bullying, no deliberate provocation – we want a chill atmosphere.
